description: Submission of details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 5 (materials) in respect of Hard Landscaping Areas and Condition 7 (Landscaping) pertaining to the mezzanine floor and the 10th floor roof terrace, in respect of the Plot 25 reserved matters approval in Phase 4A reference 21/4063/RMA dated 22/10/2021 (as amended by 23/0869/NMA dated 28/04/2023 and 24/5490/NMA dated 07/02/2023) of planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the comprehensive redevelopment of Brent Cross Cricklewood. Both conditions address only areas within the building footprint.
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area, North West London
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
